com.nalinstudios.iscan.scanlibrary

Class ResultFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.nalinstudios.iscan.scanlibrary.ResultFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ResultFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    Customized combination of ScanActivity and ResultFragment.
    Author:
    Nalin Angrish, Jhansi.
